attributes.action: teach the 'Riddle of Steel' (as popularised by Conan the Barbarian) at a primary school level.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The introduction of the riddle of steel to primary school education will give our children the necessary grounding for a stronger, brighter future.  Like Conan's life, their too will be filled with troubles and worries and thus with circulation of the 'riddle of steel' there will always be a glimmer of hope for our children and humanity

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
